welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started on your AI literacy journey [German]

step1.title: Discover Your Path [German]
step1.description: AI Square helps you understand and master AI literacy [German]
step1.content: We'll help you identify your strengths and areas for growth through personalized assessments and guided learning experiences. [German]
step1.assessmentDesc: Discover your current AI knowledge level [German]
step1.learningDesc: Get tailored recommendations based on your goals [German]

step2.title: Four Core Domains [German]
step2.description: Master the essential areas of AI literacy [German]
step2.content: Our comprehensive framework covers everything you need to know about working with AI effectively and responsibly. [German]

step3.title: Start Your Journey [German]
step3.description: Begin with an assessment and unlock your potential [German]
step3.content: Ready to discover your AI literacy level and get personalized learning recommendations? [German]
step3.benefit1: Detailed assessment of your AI knowledge [German]

goals.title: What would you like to achieve? [German]
goals.subtitle: Select your learning goals to get personalized recommendations [German]

understand.title: Understand AI Fundamentals [German]
understand.description: Learn the basics of AI, machine learning, and how AI systems work [German]

create.title: Create Content with AI [German]
create.description: Use AI tools for writing, design, art, and creative projects [German]

analyze.title: Analyze Data with AI [German]
analyze.description: Apply AI for data analysis, insights, and decision-making [German]

build.title: Build AI Solutions [German]
build.description: Develop and implement AI systems and applications [German]

teach.title: Teach AI to Others [German]
teach.description: Educate and guide others in understanding and using AI [German]

ethical.title: Ensure Ethical AI Use [German]
ethical.description: Understand and implement responsible AI practices [German]

goals.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one learning goal [German]
goals.helpText: Don't worry, you can always change these later in your profile settings. [German]

identity.title: Who are you? [German]
identity.subtitle: Help us personalize your AI learning journey [German]

student.title: Student [German]
student.description: I'm studying and want to learn AI for my academic and future career [German]

teacher.title: Educator [German]
teacher.description: I teach others and want to integrate AI into my curriculum [German]

professional.title: Professional [German]
professional.description: I work in industry and want to leverage AI in my role [German]

learner.title: Lifelong Learner [German]
learner.description: I'm curious about AI and want to explore its possibilities [German]
